title: Question:
author: BitcoinBarrel
content: Tell us about your favorite subjects and least favorite subjects. Anything interesting you learned in school you want to share?

comments.author: mari65
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 01:46:34 AMLast edit: August 03, 2022, 07:54:54 PM by mari65
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinBarrel on August 02, 2022, 11:04:37 PMTell us about your favorite subjects and least favorite subjects. Anything interesting you learned in school you want to share?mostly English

comments.author: landheer
comments.body: when I was in school I liked music lessons because my hobby was listening to music, even now I like music lessons, but now I like to learn music onlinebecause it is easier and more practical can be anytime and anywhere. and my least favorite subject is math.

comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: My favorite subject at school is chemistry. I also liked history lessons.

comments.author: Tellarmachine
comments.body: Yes! You can't just do nothing by asking us of our favorite subject in school and only list subjects studied in school. You should have made it a professional writing by using your topic question to solve problems of interest. Sad to say, sincerely, this is exactly how not to write a topic. See, we are all here to learn lessons, and so far this platform has given us almost everything to learn from. Read posts with the intention of learning something new. Continue to study the thread until you, too, would grow up to maturity.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: My favorite subject in school was World History.  I really liked World History because I liked to explore and learn about the past especially Asian History. I was most fascinated with the Geo-political landscapes, reading autobiographies, and visiting museums with family and friends.

comments.author: Uruhara
comments.body: Actually, I didn't have a favorite subject when I was at school. but I like the practice of sports because I can skip the reason being sick.I like to enjoy alone time and don't want to be in a crowd. So when other people exercise, I like to lie down in the school health room.but i used to like my english teacher. so I feel at home with English not because I like the lesson but I like looking at the beauty of the English teacher at that time hahahahahaoh shit, now i remember that i loved art lessons. because in art lessons such as painting, the situation is very quiet and quiet. and that makes me comfortable. and I happen to be good at painting. because I'm a loyal audience of cartoons or anime from Japan. sometimes I make manga.

comments.author: Joswa Russell
comments.body: I don’t know. I didn’t enjoy school much. But I definitely know what I didn’t like in school. Adn science was one of them. I was more in social sciences.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: My favorite subject back in secondary school was social studies. Because it's less stress, it's always all about family stories and others. I enjoyed it on my school days.

comments.author: yourthankyou
comments.body: Foreign languages definitely, with them you will never left alone without job

comments.author: Isador_000
comments.body: My favorite subjects at school were history and law

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.body: when I was in school, my favorite subject was math and that made me love math because I think math is one of the keys to life and success. because if we are good at math, it will be easy for us to do business and other economics, such as trading and so on, just try to imagine if we can't do math, it might be difficult to do business, especially in the field of trading, such as trading and so on. and the unique thing about mathematics is that everyone will use mathematics, even if that person doesn't like math lessons. because everyone must have a business and surely every business uses mathematics. but what I don't like is foreign language lessons.

comments.author: Morosophy
comments.body: I enjoyed literature and history classes. So much fun.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: My favorite subject when I was is school is Geography, the course is interesting, I love nature and geography is basically what is happening in our society, our daily life activities. And I don’t know why I really hate maths.

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinBarrel on August 02, 2022, 11:04:37 PMTell us about your favorite subjects and least favorite subjects. Anything interesting you learned in school you want to share?I can bet you he doesn't know all he was just listing all the whole subjects how can you know all just 3 to subject is okay, mine is English, literature and crk

comments.author: Cryptoangel01
comments.body: There is no physics. You need to put it in!

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I didn’t enjoy school too much, I got bored easily & couldn’t concentrate. I got average grades but luckily for me I found bitcoin in 2015 & I made more money than anybody in my school year. I suppose if I had to pick a favourite subject I would say sports or English because I could cruise through that & pass without doing too much studying.

comments.author: autumnleaf
comments.body: mine is recess or break time
